abstract: Decide.com has a mobile app for predicting the future price of consumer electronics.
snippet: Decide.com has a mobile app for predicting the future price of consumer electronics.
lead_paragraph: In June, Oren Etzioni, the brains behind the airline price predictor site Farecast, brought forth Decide.com, a Web site that predicted the future prices of laptops, cameras and televisions. With a Wait or Buy signal, it gave you the probability that prices would change or that a new model was coming. There was one flaw with it. You need this information in the store as much as at home or in the office on your PC. The company promised a mobile app and it is now in the Apple App store.

headline.main: Gadgetwise: Electronics Price Predictor Is Now Mobile
